data.eml:eml: Two new and one newly recorded species of Polypedilum Kieffer 1912 with DNA barcodes from Oriental China (Chironomidae: Diptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yan, Chuncai, Song, Chao, Liu, Ting, Zhao, Guangjun, Hou, Ziyuan, Cao, Wei, Wang, Xinhua (2017): Two new and one newly recorded species of Polypedilum Kieffer 1912 with DNA barcodes from Oriental China (Chironomidae: Diptera). Zootaxa 4238 (1): 109-118, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4238.1.8
